TopicTitle: Its now monday. Where is KSP 1.0?!

Articles.Content: Its monday for me in australia. Where is KSP 1.0?
Well, I think it has to be Mexico central time. Sorry:(
Pfft, everybody knows that us 'Muricans determine the universal time!

> 
> Pfft, everybody knows that us 'Muricans determine the universal time!

I know, I can't believe that Mexico gets to share *'Murican* timezones. /sarcasm
It would be funny if SQUAD released 1.0 on 00:00 for each different time zone XD. That would be epic.
Now is Apr 26 17:00 in Mexico
Still Sunday over here in California. 3PM though.

> 
> It would be funny if SQUAD released 1.0 on 00:00 for each different time zone XD. That would be epic.

Epic, but I would be very angry if 3 quarters of the world gets it before me...
Seems that the site is down for maintenance... good sign.
You know, when they release it 27 Apr. at 23:59:59 Local time in Honolulu they have it released on Monday?

> 
> Pfft, everybody knows that us 'Muricans determine the universal time!

> 
> I know, I can't believe that Mexico gets to share *'Murican* timezones. /sarcasm

Yeah, dem Mexicans need gets der OWN timezones, fars aways from we border.

> 
> Pfft, everybody knows that us 'Muricans determine the universal time!

Actually we Brits do which is why the 00 timezone goes through Greenwich, England... and sitting here on our lovely 00 timezone it's still not Monday for an hour (summertime) or 2 hours (GMT)! Hopefully though it will be released at midnight UK time as all other timezone use foreign counterfeit time which isn't nearly as good quality. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Yeah as an Australian I just add a day to release dates as a rule of thumb. On the plus side everything tends to be reased around 3 in the morning, so I don't have to painfully wait around on forums, it's always there when I wake up ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Actually we Brits do which is why the 00 timezone goes through Greenwich, England... and sitting here on our lovely 00 timezone it's still not Monday for an hour (summertime) or 2 hours (GMT)! Hopefully though it will be released at midnight UK time as all other timezone use foreign counterfeit time which isn't nearly as good quality. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Speaking from the Cotswolds... Here Here! Totally agree!!!

> 
> Actually we Brits do which is why the 00 timezone goes through Greenwich, England

That was the joke tho

I don't understand how people can be so naive as to think everything goes according to their own time zone... But honestly, I can't blame anyone.

We'll all have to wait until it's Monday on SQUAD's end of the earth for KSP 1.0. Be patient, guys.
I really hope that is faux discontent.
I was wondering why so many YouTubers were claiming it was coming out "today"; this thread cleared things up ^^
It's 00:22 in the civilized world. gimmegimmegimmegimmegimmegimmegimmegimmegimme

\**EVERY RELEASE*\*

11:59 - Oh boy, I can't wait!

12:00 - The download will start any second now...

12:01 - SQUAD DOESN'T CARE ABOUT US WORSE THAN EA MICROTRANSACTIONS CONFIRMED RAAARGHHH

1:35 - Release
Wait, wait, wait... Australia is AHEAD of Britain? I never gave consent for this! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
15mins till GMT monday..cmon SQUAD.. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
"Someone" told me it will probably come out on the first half of the mexican Workday ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

never understood the obsession with everything immediately.....

Why cant you all be patient and just get it when you get it? Heck, even if squad would delay it, i wouldnt mind, its not like a day or 2 will change anything....

> 
> never understood the obsession with everything immediately.....
> Why cant you all be patient and just get it when you get it? Heck, even if squad would delay it, i wouldnt mind, its not like a day or 2 will change anything....

But, if it doesn't release monday then we will explode from being overhyped!

Doesn't it usually get this way before a release anywayS?
